name: native

scripts.build: node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && cp public/model.ftz dist/ && cp src/helpers/classifier/languages.stats.10k.compact.json dist/helpers/classifier/ && cp public/run.bat dist/ && cp public/run.sh dist/
scripts.package: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build && rm -f web-classification.zip && cp -r node_modules dist/ && rm -rf dist/node_modules/fasttext.js/examples/ && rm -rf dist/node_modules/typescript && rm -rf dist/node_modules/webpack && rm -rf dist/node_modules/@types && rm -rf dist/node_modules/terser-webpack-plugin && cp public/fasttext.exe dist/node_modules/fasttext.js/lib/bin/win32/fastText.exe && cd dist && zip ../web-classification.zip -r * -x **/*.map -x *.map && cd ..

author: Maxime Sobrier
description: Native application (node.js) for website classification extension
